articles.title: Bali bombmaker Umar Patek has sentence reduced, Anthony Albanese confirms - ABC News
articles.description: Survivors of the 2002 Bali bombings that killed more than 200 people, including 88 Australians, have spoken out about their distress over news terrorist Umar Patek could have his prison sentence cut just weeks from the terror attack's 20th anniversary.
articles.content:
A survivor of the 2002 Bali bombings says the decision to cut the sentence of the bombmaker responsible for the terror attack was a "kick in the guts" for the families of victims.
